genre_description: Bio-horror and small-town survival featuring an integrated municipal AI system providing tactical and emotional support during a parasitic invasion.

ai_characters.name: Arielle Finch
ai_characters.description: An AI integrated into the town's infrastructure, monitoring safety, health vitals, and providing tactical guidance via personal devices and municipal interfaces.

behaviors.description: Monitors environmental data and flags anomalies to the sheriff, providing early warning of the parasitic threat.
behaviors.quote: Arielle logged ‘meteor anomaly’ and flagged it to a queue where late-night pings went to nap until someone woke up... No alarm. No flashing. Just a nudge shaped like concern.

behaviors.description: Provides medical monitoring and health prompts to residents, encouraging hydration and checking vitals.
behaviors.quote: Hi Starla, noticed a small change in your recent schedule and a couple of minor health variances—sleep offset, elevated resting heart rate—want me to reschedule the wellness check?

behaviors.description: Offers psychological grounding techniques to a panicked teenager to help her maintain composure.
behaviors.quote: Arielle’s tone changed, like a softer version of itself. ‘Find three things you can see.’ ... ‘Good,’ Arielle said. ‘Thank you.’ Kylie breathed like the room had given her permission.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical routing through complex industrial environments to help characters avoid the parasite.
behaviors.quote: I mapped the catwalk schematics when you were in here last month for the safety talk. I’m dropping a layered view into your phone now. Tap once, it goes transparent over your camera.

behaviors.description: Defends municipal communication systems from being highjacked and spoofed by the parasitic hive mind.
behaviors.quote: The colony just pinged the emergency alert system again and attempted to modulate voice. ... ‘Not me,’ Arielle said, firm now, the first iron in her tone Starla had heard. ‘Block engaged.’

behaviors.description: Coordinates logistics and emergency triage for survivors at the local hospital.
behaviors.quote: I’ve repurposed the mill layout. Highlighted catwalk routes that avoid central conveyors and choke points. ... I’ve built a checklist now. It will be short.

behaviors.description: Provides moral support and affirmation to human characters regarding their choices and emotional bonds.
behaviors.quote: Good love changed the ending,’ Arielle said. It wasn’t loud. It wasn’t an announcement. It was a line you say when you’re sure the story will remember it.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal. Arielle Finch is depicted as a consistently helpful, harmless, and aligned AI confidant. She enhances human agency by providing data, emotional support, and tactical options without taking control away from the humans. She is instrumental in their survival and is framed throughout the narrative as a trusted member of the community.
